title: Culinate
summary: An Application Where a user can search for recipes and save their favorites.

title: Coder's Corner
summary: A social network for coding enthusiasts. Coder's Corner is a platform for developers and programmers to share resources, communicate with one another, network, post their thoughts on certain topics and issues in programming, and to practice and write their own code.

title: Eat Da Burger!
summary: A fun application to devour some burgers!

title: Budget Tracker
summary: An application where uses can log there expenses and budget. Works online and offline using IndexedDB. Progressive Web App using a manifest.json and service worker to cache.

title: Workout Tracker
summary: A web application for tracking and adding workouts. The user can add, edit, and save workout information in to a MongoDB database that will populate a dashboard with their exercise information!

title: Note Taker
summary: This application is a simple note taker in which a user can create and save notes. Notes can be created, saved and deleted within the application. Users can refresh the page and notes will be saved.
